original: intros l e Hsorted Hin. unfold maxIndex. induction l as [|e' l' IHl]. - simpl. intros _. inversion Hin. - simpl. intros [Heq | Hin']. + subst. apply Nat.le_max_l. + apply Nat.max_lub; auto. apply IHl; auto. apply sorted_cons; auto.
